705504f-a.text:
105-7 Lorraine Street, north side, between Hicks and Henry Streets. In the background are houses on Bush Street.
June 25, 1931
P. L. Sperr
705504f-a.folder: Lorraine Street & Hicks Street, Brooklyn, NY

705503f-a.text:
81-85 Lorraine Street, north side, 100 ft. west of Hicks Street (right, not shown). In the center of the view is seen No. 83 which is partially located in the rear of two homes and contains a front garden which is unusual for this area.
June 9, 1938.
P. L. Sperr
705503f-a.folder: Lorraine Street & Hicks Street, Brooklyn, NY
